notes:
For the first time in its history the Dakar started in Portugal, in the capital city of Lisbon, departing on December 31, 2005. The rally continued for 2,991 competitive miles through Morocco, Mauritania, Mali, Guinea, and finished in Dakar, Senegal on January 15, 2006.

This was the 5th win for 'The Tsar of Dakar' and the 7th for Kamaz. Both Chagin & Kamaz would go on to dominate the Dakar with 3 wins over the next 4 rallies (2008 was canceled) before his retirement after the 2011 Dakar.
